globalMetadata.title: AVxcelerate Sensors Simulator API 2025 R2
globalMetadata.summary: Connect AVxcelerate Sensors Simulator in your own simulation environment and incorporate your perception stack into the simulation loop.
globalMetadata.description: This document is intended for developers who need to develop client applications in order to integrate AVxcelerate Sensors Simulator in their driving simulation application or to integrate the System Under Test (SUT) into the simulation loop.
